sentences.sContent: children with aggressive or anti-social tendencies
sentences.sCn: 具有攻击性倾向或反社会倾向的儿童

sentences.sContent: ...our tendency to do things against our interests...
...there is medium confidence that there has an overall slight tendency toward less dryness...
...they had a tendency to collapse under the weight of extra grain - a trait called lodging...

remMethod.val: tend(趋向) ＋ ency(表状态) → 倾向， 趋向

words.tran: 有偏见的，有倾向的；宣传性的
宣传性的；有支持某种立场的倾向

trans.tranCn: 趋向， 趋势， 倾向
trans.tranOther: if someone or something has a tendency to do or become a particular thing, they are likely to do or become it
